Replay larvaÔÉÅ

class larvaworld.lib.model.agents._larva_replay.LarvaReplay(data, **kwargs)[source]ÔÉÅ

Bases: Larva

params(length=PositiveNumber, orientation=RandomizedPhase, radius=PositiveNumber, pos=NumericTuple2DRobust, odor=ClassAttr, default_color=RandomizedColor, selected=Boolean, visible=Boolean, group=String, unique_id=String, name=String)

Class representing a larva used to replay recorded data.

dataReplayData

The recorded data for the replay larva.

**kwargs

Additional keyword arguments to pass to the base Larva class constructor.

This class extends the base Larva class to create a replay larva using recorded data. It initializes the replay larva‚Äôs position and orientation based on the provided data.

step()[source]ÔÉÅ

Update the replay larva‚Äôs position and orientation based on recorded data.

Notes

This method updates the replay larva‚Äôs position and orientation for each time step based on recorded data. It also updates the trajectory and orientation_trajectory attributes.

class larvaworld.lib.model.agents._larva_replay.LarvaReplayContoured(data, **kwargs)[source]ÔÉÅ

Class representing a replay larva with contour data based on recorded data.

This class extends the LarvaReplay class and adds contour data to the replay larva based on recorded data.

Segmented replay larvaÔÉÅ

class larvaworld.lib.model.agents._larva_replay.LarvaReplaySegmented(data, **kwargs)[source]ÔÉÅ

Bases: LarvaReplay, LarvaSegmented

params(Nsegs=PositiveInteger, segment_ratio=Parameter, segs=List, density=PositiveNumber, base_vertices=XYLine, body_plan=Selector, guide_points=XYLine, symmetry=Selector, closed=Boolean, vertices=XYLine, width=PositiveNumber, length=PositiveNumber, orientation=RandomizedPhase, radius=PositiveNumber, pos=NumericTuple2DRobust, odor=ClassAttr, default_color=RandomizedColor, selected=Boolean, visible=Boolean, group=String, unique_id=String, name=String)

Class representing a segmented replay larva based on recorded data.

This class extends the LarvaReplay class and creates a segmented replay larva with multiple body segments based on recorded data.

step()[source]ÔÉÅ

Update the replay larva‚Äôs position, orientation, and body segments based on recorded data.

Notes

This method updates the replay larva‚Äôs position and orientation using the base class LarvaReplay and creates and positions multiple body segments based on recorded data.
